name: Kiwi (Tymski)
description:
Hello!
This is a simple endless runner. 
Jump between platforms. Collect coins.

You get more KiwiCash from coins the richer you are.
Firstly you get 50 KiwiDollars for a coin, then 100, 150, 200, 250, 500 and finally 1000.

In the game settings, there is an option to wear a cool hat.
You can also change the speed of the game from 100% up to 300%.

Other game:
Check out my other game, Super Hammer, in which you are a hammer conquering mountains. https://tymski.itch.io/super-hammer
